\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&& M && \cdot \\
	{\,} & {M_i } && {M_k} &&& {\,} \\
	&& {M_j } && \cdot
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}", hook, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\text{PO}}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{e_i}", from=2-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{f_{k,i}}", from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{f_{j,i}}"', from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}"', hook, from=2-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}", hook, from=2-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\text{PO}}"{description}, draw=none, from=3-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}"', hook, from=3-3, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
